title: Processor Design
description: Collaborated on a small team with other student designers to build a microprocessor to run mathematical algorithms. Successfully designed and tested the microprocessor using Intel's Quartus software. Displayed my expertise on the processor by simulating it in Minecraft.

title: Web Development: TypeSmart
description: Developed a typing web app to improve and track typing speed. Implemented a Firebase NoSQL database backend to store user information.

title: Software Quality: Dominion
description: Collaborated with a team to develop a video game version of the classic card game Dominion. Utilized test-driven development methods to ensure minimal code rework. Programmed in C# using the .NET framework, achieving 100% branch and mutation coverage.

title: Thread Design
description: Designed and implemented threads in the xv6 educational operating system.

title: SQL Database: Build Buddy
description: Built a SQL database and frontend to allow users to sort and search computer parts and create compatible builds.

title: Object-Oriented Programming: Joust
description: Developed in Java. A recreation of the classic arcade game joust with a few additions such as new enemy movements and turrets. The project utilizes object-oriented design principles.

title: Python Development: Binding of Garrett
description: An engaging Python-based dungeon crawler-style game that I developed, inspired by "The Binding of Isaac." It showcases my skills in game design and development.

title: Web Development: Friendly Biking Surfaces
description: Created an online web app that enables users to build biking routes as well as post and view trail hazards. My project partner and I were challenged with making use of the Mapbox API to create routes.

title: Concept Development: SpaceVac
description: A StartUp Weekend project. My team and I transformed the idea of SpaceVac, a space debris cleaning service, from a fun brainstorming concept to a fully developed business plan in one weekend.

title: Product Refinement:  Black + Decker Drill
description: Collaboratively worked with a team to analyze a product from Amazon, research customer feedback, brainstorm refinements, introduce new features, create a bill of materials, and identify production cost reductions.
